message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $15,000. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I still feel that $9,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
